atk-abh03a24:2_2: Tattha sakasamaye saṅkhāre ādīnavato nibbānañca ānisaṁsato passantassa saṁyojanappahānaṁ hotīti nicchayo.
atk-abh03a24:2_3: Yesaṁ pana tesu dvīsupi ekaṁsikavādaṁ gahetvā “ānisaṁsadassāvinova saṁyojanappahānaṁ hotī”ti laddhi,
atk-abh03a24:3_1: nibbāne ca ānisaṁsadassāvī hotīti pañhasmiṁ ayamadhippāyo –
atk-abh03a24:3_2: ānisaṁsadassāvissa saṁyojanānaṁ pahānaṁ hotīti tesaṁ laddhi.
atk-abh03a24:3_3: Nanu saṅkhāre aniccato manasikaroto saṁyojanā pahīyantīti ca puṭṭho āmantāti paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a24:3_4: Tena te saṅkhāre ca aniccato manasikaroti,
atk-abh03a24:3_5: nibbāne ca ānisaṁsadassāvī hotīti idaṁ āpajjati,
atk-abh03a24:3_9: Sakavādī panassa adhippāyaṁ madditvā aniccamanasikārassa ānisaṁsadassāvitāya ca ekato paṭiññātattā dvinnaṁ
atk-abh03a24:3_10: phassānaṁ dvinnaṁ cittānaṁ samodhānaṁ hotīti pucchati.
atk-abh03a24:3_17: Yadi tāva aniccādito manasikaroto pahānaṁ bhaveyya,
atk-abh03a24:3_20: anussavavasena nibbāne ānisaṁsaṁ passantassa vipassanācitteneva bhaveyya,
atk-abh03a24:3_23: Yasmā pana ariyamaggakkhaṇe aniccādimanasikārassa kiccaṁ nipphattiṁ gacchati puna niccatotiādigahaṇassa anuppattidhammabhāvato,
atk-abh03a24:3_25: tasmā kiccanipphattivasena aniccādito manasikaroto ārammaṇaṁ katvā pavattivasena ca nibbāne ānisaṁsadassāvissa saṁyojanānaṁ pahānaṁ hotīti veditabbaṁ.
atk-abh03a24:7_2: Tattha yesaṁ “nibbānaṁ maññatī”tiādīnaṁ ayoniso atthaṁ gahetvā amatārammaṇaṁ saṁyojanaṁ hotīti laddhi,
atk-abh03a24:7_7: amatassa saṁyojaniyādibhāvo āpajjatīti codetuṁ amataṁ saṁyojaniyantiādimāha.
atk-abh03a24:7_10: Nibbānaṁ nibbānatoti āhaṭasuttaṁ pana diṭṭhadhammanibbānaṁ sandhāya bhāsitaṁ,
atk-abh03a24:10_2: Tattha rūpaṁ sappaccayaṭṭhena sārammaṇaṁ nāma hoti,
atk-abh03a24:10_4: Yesaṁ pana avisesena rūpaṁ sārammaṇanti laddhi,
atk-abh03a24:10_6: te sandhāya ārammaṇatthassa vibhāgadassanatthaṁ pucchā sakavādissa,
atk-abh03a24:10_9: Na vattabbanti pañhe olubbhārammaṇaṁ sandhāya paṭiññā sakavādissa.
atk-abh03a24:13_2: Tattha yesaṁ anusayā nāma cittavippayuttā ahetukā abyākatā,
atk-abh03a24:13_7: Atha naṁ anārammaṇena nāma evaṁvidhena bhavitabbanti codetuṁ rūpantiādimāha.
atk-abh03a24:13_9: Saṅkhārakkhandho anārammaṇoti pañhe cittasampayuttasaṅkhārakkhandhaṁ sandhāya paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a24:13_13: Sānusayoti pañhe pana appahīnānusayattā sānusayatā anuññātā.
atk-abh03a24:13_19: Evarūpassa ca idaṁ nāma ārammaṇanti na vattabbaṁ.
atk-abh03a24:16_2: Tattha yasmā arahā cakkhuviññāṇasamaṅgī ñāṇīti vuccati,
atk-abh03a24:16_3: tassa ñāṇassa tasmiṁ khaṇe ārammaṇaṁ natthi,
atk-abh03a24:19_3: tasmā tadārammaṇena cittena ārammaṇassa natthitāya anārammaṇena bhavitabbanti atītaṁ anārammaṇanti yesaṁ laddhi,
atk-abh03a24:22_4: Tattha asukacittaṁ nāma vitakkassārammaṇaṁ na hotīti niyamābhāvato siyā sabbaṁ cittaṁ vitakkānupatitaṁ,
atk-abh03a24:22_5: vitakkavippayuttacittasabbhāvato pana na sabbaṁ cittaṁ vitakkānupatitaṁ.
atk-abh03a24:22_6: Iti imaṁ vibhāgaṁ akatvā aviseseneva sabbaṁ cittaṁ vitakkānupatitanti yesaṁ laddhi,
atk-abh03a24:25_3: tasmā sabbaso vitakkayato vicārayato antamaso manodhātupavattikālepi vitakkavipphāro saddoyevāti yesaṁ laddhi,
atk-abh03a24:25_5: te sandhāya sabbasoti pucchā sakavādissa paṭiññā itarassa.
atk-abh03a24:25_7: phassādivipphāropi saddo bhaveyyāti codetuṁ sabbaso phusayatotiādimāha.
atk-abh03a24:25_9: Vitakkavipphāro saddo sotaviññeyyoti vitakkassa vipphāramattameva saddoti katvā pucchati,
atk-abh03a24:25_12: Nanu vitakkavipphārasaddo na sotaviññeyyoti idaṁ tasseva laddhiyā dasseti.
atk-abh03a24:25_15: Itaro pana “vitakkavipphārasaddaṁ sutvā ādisatī” ti vacanato sotaviññeyyovāti vadati.
atk-abh03a24:28_2: Tattha yasmā koci aññaṁ bhaṇissāmīti aññaṁ bhaṇati,
atk-abh03a24:28_3: tasmā nayathācittassa vācā cittānurūpā cittānugatikā na hoti,
atk-abh03a24:28_8: Atha naṁ “yadi taṁsamuṭṭhāpakaṁ cittaṁ na siyā,
atk-abh03a24:28_9: phassādayopi tasmiṁ khaṇe na siyu”nti codetuṁ aphassakassātiādimāha.
atk-abh03a24:28_10: Na bhaṇitukāmotiādīsu yasmā aññaṁ bhaṇissāmīti aññaṁ bhaṇantopi bhaṇitukāmoyeva nāma hoti,
atk-abh03a24:29_0: 565.Nanu atthi koci aññaṁ bhaṇissāmītiādīsu cīvaranti bhaṇitukāmo cīranti bhaṇeyya.
atk-abh03a24:29_3: iti pubbabhāgena cittena asadisattā ayathācitto nāma hoti,
atk-abh03a24:29_6: iti acittakā sā vācāti atthaṁ sandhāya iminā udāharaṇena “nayathācittassa vācā”ti patiṭṭhāpitāpi appatiṭṭhāpitāva hotīti.
atk-abh03a24:32_2: Tattha yasmā koci aññatra gacchissāmīti aññatra gacchati,
atk-abh03a24:32_3: tasmā nayathācittassa kāyakammaṁ cittānurūpaṁ cittānugatikaṁ na hoti,
atk-abh03a24:35_2: Tattha samannāgatapaññatti paṭilābhapaññattīti dve paññattiyo veditabbā.
atk-abh03a24:35_4: Aṭṭha samāpattilābhino pana samāpattiyo kiñcāpi na ekakkhaṇe pavattanti,
atk-abh03a24:35_9: Tattha yesaṁ imaṁ vibhāgaṁ aggahetvā yasmā jhānalābhīnaṁ atītānāgatāni jhānānipi atthi,
